artist: Designer: Frank Graham Holmes; Decorator: Schell Lewis; Manufacturer: Lenox
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Judy and Kenneth Dayton and their support of architecture in the Twin Cities
description: small cup with image of University of Virginia, opposite handle; plain saucer with copper luster rim
markings: \'L[with 2 leaf fronds]/LENOX/Architects\' Tea Set/1933/copyright\', stamped in green, on bottom of cup and saucer; \'948\', stamped on bottom of cup
medium: Porcelain with pink luster and black transfer decoration
title: Cup and saucer
